wikitext.*:
'''The Fellowship of the Ring''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* '''[[Fellowship of the Ring]], a fairly uncommon (though highly popular) name for the [[Ring-bearer]] and his eight companions.'''
==Books==
* '''''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', being the First Part of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.'''
* ''[[The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', a film tie-in photobook by [[Gary Russell]].
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Visual Companion]]'', a film tie-in photobook by [[Jude Fisher]].
==Adaptations==
===Films===
* '''''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', [[Peter Jackson]]'s [[2001]] film.'''
** [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]], a version of the film with an extra 30 minutes of footage.
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'', the soundtrack.
*** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]'', the extended soundtrack.
* "The Fellowship of the Ring", the first half of [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1955 radio series)]].
* "The Fellowship of the Ring", the seventh episode of [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], aired [[19 April]], [[1986]].
* ''[[Fellowship!]]'', an independent musical parody.

===Games===
* ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring Sourcebook]]'', a [[2003]] supplement for [[Decipher]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
* [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]], [[Vivendi]]'s video game.
* ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring (board game)]]'', a [[1983]] board game from [[Iron Crown Enterprises]].
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', a [[2001]] supplement for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.

==Other==
* ''[[Beyond the Movie: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', National Geographic documentary.
* "[[The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers]]", an episode of South Park.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Fellowship of the Ring, The (disambiguation)}}
